last_episode_to_air.name: Tuesday
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the priest makes a desperate bid to banish Marianne, Emma finds herself torn between two worlds, and Aurore searches for a way to save her friend.

name: Marianne
overview: When a novelist realizes her terrifying stories are coming true, she returns to her hometown to face the demons from her past that inspire her writing.

episodes.name: Your Dreams
episodes.overview: Just as best-selling author Emma Larsimon announces she's done writing horror, an unnerving visit from an old friend draws her back to her hometown.

episodes.name: Tradition
episodes.overview: While a quirky police inspector digs into her parents' case, Emma drags Camille back to Caro's home and reconnects with the rest of her old crew.

episodes.name: Not an Easy Person
episodes.overview: Tonio makes a disturbing discovery at the shore. Another harrowing night with Emma pushes Camille to her limit. Marianne turns up the heat.

episodes.name: Beautiful Moment
episodes.overview: Emma's grieving is cut short by an urgent request, and a grisly scene at the Daugeron home leads Inspector Ronan into a world of demonic secrets.

episodes.name: You Left Her
episodes.overview: Fifteen years earlier, in a bid to drive away Emma’s nightmares, the friends gather at their old school for a ritual that will change their lives.

episodes.name: Memories
episodes.overview: Inspector Ronan connects the dots between Emma's books and more real-world tragedies. He, Emma and Séby hatch a plan to destroy Marianne.

episodes.name: Too Young to Handle It
episodes.overview: Fleeing to different parts of the island, the friends encounter terrifying sights and ghostly messengers. One by one, they turn on Emma.

episodes.name: Tuesday
episodes.overview: As the priest makes a desperate bid to banish Marianne, Emma finds herself torn between two worlds, and Aurore searches for a way to save her friend.
